name: crossover baby cardigan
sizes_available: medium preemie, large preemie, newborn, 0 - 3 months
notes:
this sweet little baby cardigan is knitted from the top down, and has just 2 little sleeve seams to join.

there are 4 sizes ~  medium preemie, large preemie, newborn and 0 - 3 months .

requires:
dk yarn (8ply / light worsted)
4mm needles 
2 small buttons

you can choose long or short sleeves.

a lovely gender-neutral knit for a new baby.

looks like a little kimono. so cute.
